content:
Yes! some of these pizza places offer vegan options. Here is the list of vegan pizza options available in the popular pizza places in New Haven:

1. Frank Pepe Pizzeria Napoletana - offers several pizza toppings suitable for vegans such as roasted red peppers, artichokes, mushrooms, and olives. You can always ask for a cheese-less pizza or swap cheese for vegan cheese.

2. Sally's Apizza - offers vegan cheese as a substitute for dairy cheese. You can order a "Vegan Pie" with your choice of toppings.

3. Modern Apizza - offers vegan cheese as a substitute for dairy cheese. You can ask for a "Vegan Pie" with your choice of toppings.

4. BAR - offers several vegan toppings such as artichokes, onions, mushrooms, and eggplant. You can ask for a cheese-less pizza or swap cheese for vegan cheese.

5. Zuppardi's Apizza - offers vegan cheese as a substitute for dairy cheese. You can ask for a cheese-less pizza or customize your own pizza with vegan toppings.

It's always best to call or check the official website to confirm if vegan options are available and if they have any specific vegan menu items.
